english.segment1: I am here all alone. It's just You, me and this broken prayer. How I've longed to share. The feelings of this restless heart. It's been a long and narrow road. And my feet are bare with no soul. And when I fall down to the ground. I'll get back up and carry on
english.segment2: 'Cause I'm longing to know You. Longing to find You. Longing feel You deep inside. You know that I love You. You know that I trust You. Sometimes it's hard to feel You next to me
english.segment3: But I'll carry on. I'll carry on
english.segment4: When Your wind blows. It leads me to places unknown. I may not see You. But I can feel You leading me on
english.segment5: And when I find You. You'll be there with Your arms open wide. Until that day comes. Yes, I have the hope of new life
english.segment6: So I'll carry on. I'll carry on, I'll carry on
english.segment7: I'm longing to know You. I'm longing to find You. Longing feel You deep inside. You know that I love You. You know that I trust You. Sometimes it's hard to feel You next to me
